item.description:
Hello once again!  I am hosting another awesome day of gaming for those that want to get into the spirit of the season!  Some of you may be wanting to sit in line for hours and hours to score deals on crap peddled upon you by companies sending jobs to China - and if that's for you - very cool!  Me, however, well... I would rather be gaming with my bro-s and my ho-s. :D

So... if you want to have a crappy time dealing with long lines and bitchy parents having to spend money on garbage their kids will only appreciate for 2 weeks... then enjoy the mad rush of purchasing this season.  However... if you want to have a kick arse time playing cool games and hanging out with fun people kicking my arse at games, then come by and enjoy for the entirety of the day!
item.name: Black Friday of Games
